oracle.pg.hbase

Class HBaseCommon

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.pg.hbase.HBaseCommon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MesgConsts, OracleCSVDatatypeConstants, OraclePropertyGraphConstants, OraclePropertyGraphDatatypeConstants

    public class HBaseCommon
extends java.lang.Object
implements MesgConsts, OraclePropertyGraphConstants
    This class contains common utility functions that are specific to Apache HBase.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] concatenate(byte[] ba1, byte[] ba2)
      This method returns a byte array that concatenates the two given byte array If one of the argument is null, the return value will be the other argument.

      This method populates an instance of OracleElement (vertex or edge) with the values embedded in the KeyValue object

    • Method Detail

      • concatenate

        public static byte[] concatenate(byte[] ba1,
                                 byte[] ba2)
        This method returns a byte array that concatenates the two given byte array If one of the argument is null, the return value will be the other argument.

      • getPropertyKey

        public static java.lang.String getPropertyKey(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell kv)
        This method populates an instance of OracleElement (vertex or edge) with the values embedded in the KeyValue object

      • getPropertyValue

        public static java.lang.Object getPropertyValue(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.Cell kv,
                                                boolean bDebug,
                                                java.lang.StringBuilder sbDebug,
                                                java.text.SimpleDateFormat sdf)
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                java.text.ParseException
        This method returns a property value object based on an input HBase table Cell.
        Parameters:
        kv - cell of a HBase table row. Note that the table has to be either a property graph vertex table or a property graph edge table.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.text.ParseException

      • getSaltSize

        public static int getSaltSize()
        Gets the salt size
        Returns:
        the salt size

      • strToSerializable

        public static final java.lang.Object strToSerializable(java.lang.String s)
                                                throws java.io.IOException
        Convert from a String encoding to a Serializable object
        Parameters:
        s - String representation of a Java Serializable object. It MUST not be null.
        Returns:
        a Java Serializable object obtained from an encoded String.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
